about_the_game:
Veil of Ashes is a real-time tactics game set in a dark steampunk universe. Fight for control of strategic points across diverse maps in both multiplayer and skirmish matches. Command units ranging from infantry and tanks to colossal behemoths.

Overview

Veil of Ashes throws you straight into the heat of battle!

Command various infantry squads, tanks and behemoth units and seize strategic points in tactically demanding battles, whether you're playing solo or facing off against other players. Earn Reinforcement Points during the battle to request stronger units, tactical strikes and support.

Tactical Variety

Explore numerous unique units across three distinct factions!

With the Battalion Editor, you can assemble battalions from a variety of units and take them into battle. Build a balanced lineup to counter any threat, unlocking countless unique playstyles and tactical options.

Choose from three powerful factions

Choose between three factions.

  • The theocratic Sacrum Imperium, led by the Novissima Ecclesia, is a fanatical faction that overwhelms its enemies with sheer firepower and super-heavy "Cataphractus"-tanks.

    “Dominating the western Mediterranean and expanding unstoppably, the Sacrum Imperium is the strongest power on the European continent.”

  • The feudal Lohenreich, whose knights march into battle aboard heavily armored "Lanzierer"-tanks, accompanied by loyal "Panzerknecht"-Soldiers. 

    ”A remnant of ancient times in Central Europe. A mighty empire that is crumbling with each passing day. But its shards are ready to defend what is left.”

  • The socialist Communes that overrun their opponents with agile wheeled armoured vehicles of the ‘Force Rapide’ and masses of ‘Volontaires’ and ‘Conscrits’.

    “The kingdoms of western Europe have fallen under the force of the people’s anger and the Communes are rising in their place. The revolution is far from over.”

The World of Veil of Ashes

In 1704, the world was consumed by an unprecedented inferno. Countless states, empires and rulers fell victim to the beginning of the end of the world. But with the fire came Cinium. Energetic fragments of the inferno, as white as angel feathers and incredibly powerful. It was to lay the future for all that was to come.

200 years later, old and new empires have risen from the remnants of the past. They find themselves in a world dominated by industry and ash. More and more land is being turned into lifeless deserts by the storms of embers and fire, while the sky is falling under a grey veil.

Cinium drives the machinery of vital industry, in peace and in war. Powerful steam engines drive tanks and behemoths across the battlefields to defend or conquer the dwindling habitat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
